snippet: Mariusz Kaminski, the former official at the Central Anticorruption Bureau, was sentenced in March to three years in prison but had appealed.
abstract: Poland's president pardons Mariusz Kaminski, who had appealed his conviction for abuse of power as country's top anti-corruption official.
lead_paragraph: Mariusz Kaminski, the former official at the Central Anticorruption Bureau, was sentenced in March to three years in prison but had appealed.

headline.main: Poland: Ex-Chief of Anti-Graft Agency Is Pardoned in Abuse-of-Power Case
headline.print_headline: Europe; Poland: Ex-Chief of Anti-Graft Agency Is Pardoned in Abuse-of-Power Case
